Stratagus is a real-time strategy gaming engine.\ Games which use Stratagus:\ Wargus, War1gus, Stargus, Aleona\'s Tales and Wyrmsun\n\ To actually play anything you will need to generate \'game data files\' on your PC and copy them to your device.\ Please visit https://drodin.com/stratagus for instructions.\n\ Controls: Touch/click a unit to select it, touch/click and drag to select multiple units.\ Use on-screen controls (bottom left) or keyboard for unit actions.\ Drag map with two fingers or by pressing and holding middle mouse button.
